quantum-physics.title: Numerical Methods in Quantum Mechanics
quantum-physics.description: Solving the Schrödinger equation for non-standard potentials using Python and NumPy.
quantum-physics.content:
This project involved developing a Python-based solver for the time-independent Schrödinger equation. By using the Finite Difference Method, I simulated wavefunctions for various potential wells.

Tools Used:

  • NumPy & SciPy
  • Matplotlib

interact-club.title: Interact Club Founding
interact-club.description: Founded the inaugural club at Comfort HS. Recruited 30+ members and established service projects.
interact-club.content: As Founding President, I established a sustainable framework for student volunteerism in the Comfort area, partnering with local Rotary chapters.
